title: i can help u get plat
body: add me "mydearxiu" if u need help reaching bronze to plat.

replies.body: I can carry you to Bronze 5 anyday my man, complete FREE of charge.
Would love to improve my game play, not yet ranked as I've only done 5 of 10 placements, but I'm sure I'll be bronze 5.

sure, add me DigitX2, im in b5 and it really sucks ;-;
